@ GBGandalf
R5, in the film business, is a copy of a movie made with a telecine machine from an analog source and is typically of a lower quality than other region releases.[1]
In telecine (TK) the digitization is performed by the studio itself with very professional (and expensive) equipment and usually from the original source (the movie reel).
